 var grepRE = regexp.MustCompile(`^HEAD:([^:]+):(\d+):`)
 
+func readLineDropTooLong(r *bufio.Reader) ([]byte, error) {
+	for {
+		line, isPrefix, err := r.ReadLine()
+		if err != nil {
+			return nil, err
+		}
+		if !isPrefix {
+			line = bytes.TrimRight(line, "\n")
+			return line, nil
+		}
+		for isPrefix {
+			line, isPrefix, err = r.ReadLine()
+			if err != nil {
+				return nil, err
+			}
+		}
+	}
+}
+
